discourse_list.title: FRAUD ALERT (or WTF alert)! Please help!

content.content: There may be a scam Going on… I want my DAI back!   And it looks like it’s coming from DAI on Etherscan!! I got a notice on etherscan that I got a airdrop from aatu.site.   I went to check it out.  It looked like this was worth 3.22+ ETH.   I thought this is fishy.   I DID NOT make any transactions.   YET… very shortly… $2616 DAI Left my MetaMask Wallet.  Metamask shows no Activity. The website aatu.site. Directs to something that looks like Uniswap protocol. However, the TXN goes to DAI and MakerDao. PLEASE ADVISE ASAP - AND/OR help me recover these funds! It went to a Balancer Vault - Then to a 1 inch Aggregation. https://etherscan.io/token/0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f?a=0xf2f400c138f9fb900576263af0bc7fcde2b1b8a8 https://etherscan.io/tx/0x1915d0f90cd733b59e0e50cd2995d8410b39b83c060cdcfa6facefa2cfa7bd4d PLEASE HELP!!! Call Text to - +1-720-495-8814 email - [email protected]
No activity showing in MetaMask  image1366×768 126 KB
Here’s the aatu.site contract addy… 0xcdbd4089c2f98da715e52127680f87afdb183a2e Please help me recover!

These messages were HIDDEN?   This was clearly a Request for HELP and an offer to HELP the MakerDao find a new Fraud alert… IF it is one, and IF they didn’t know already.   Please un-hide my message and HELP! Respectfully - Tien

Tien:  These messages were HIDDEN? This was clearly a Request for HELP and an offer to HELP the MakerDao   Your posts were automatically hidden because you made the same post multiple times in different categories. I have unhidden this thread.     Tien:  I got a notice on etherscan that I got a airdrop from aatu.site. I went to check it out. It looked like this was worth 3.22+ ETH.   First mistake. These airdrops are often scams.     Tien:  And it looks like it’s coming from DAI on Etherscan!!   It isn’t, you’re misreading Etherscan.     Tien:  https://etherscan.io/tx/0x1915d0f90cd733b59e0e50cd2995d8410b39b83c060cdcfa6facefa2cfa7bd4d   This transaction exchanges DAI for ETH on 1inch. The ETH is still in your wallet. You can see the inflow of ETH under Internal Transactions here. Your wallet initiated the transaction. If you did not initiate this transaction, you have given permission to someone else or a smart contract, or someone has obtained your private keys. In that instance it is likely your wallet is compromised and I would move everything out to a new wallet and practice better security moving forwards.

Thank you Patrick - I appreciate your response.  Sorry for freak out! I know these airdrops are often scams - but how does one even Look at them without risk?  I feel like all I did was see the drop on Etherscan, then noticed the name of drop and then open their website aatu.site. 2nd - “This transaction exchanges DAI for ETH on 1inch. The ETH is still in your wallet”  So I had $2616 in DAI AND 3.2796 ETH in my wallet before this event.  I now see the 3.2796 ETH but NOT the DAI. Are you saying that now my DAI is ETH (Changed on 1inch?) AND is still in my Wallet?   How do I track that down?   It’s def NOT showing in my Metamask as I would have something like 5.2 ETH total right?   I’m confused.   BIG TIP for you IF you can help me recover this $2616. On the link you sent, I see it going FROM 1inch router TO 0x448891c149a699264daa8b9b290d2b5983bf48cf - which is NOT my wallet addy. Please help if you can at all more.   And again, thank you for your prompt response.
Tien:  0x448891c149a699264daa8b9b290d2b5983bf48cf   My apologies. I though this was your address. Can you confirm your public wallet address?

Tien:  I know these airdrops are often scams - but how does one even Look at them without risk?   Don’t look at them at all. If strange coins arrive in your wallet, and you don’t know why, assume it’s a scam. Looking again, is your address https://etherscan.io/address/0x5255e33362f533A947bA801f4f3a813D82Fa8341? If so, earlier today that address granted permission to an unverified contract to spend unlimited DAI. You can see that approval by going here: https://etherscan.io/tokenapprovalchecker?search=0x5255e33362f533a947ba801f4f3a813d82fa8341 and toggling “Show All Approvals”.  Unverified contract that has approval to spend DAI  Transaction granting that approval.  Note that the transaction granting approval did not come from your wallet. Did you connect your wallet to the suspicious site and sign anything when you were looking into the airdropped token? It seems you’ve allowed someone malicious the ability to transfer DAI out of your address. I’m afraid it looks like you’ve been scammed and your coins are not going to be recoverable. I’m sorry this has happened to you.
my public addy is… 0x5255e33362f533A947bA801f4f3a813D82Fa8341 Thank you!

WOW!  Thank you SO MUCH.  This is an expensive lesson for me.  and great help by YOU.  Thank you.    I did hop on that site and connect my wallet.   SUPER DUMB.  never happen again. How do you REVOKE the tokens aproved on Etherscan?   I have disconnected from all sites through Metamask but Etherscan is still showing connection to 4 sites.   Do I trust going through Etherscan.io, connecting my wallet there and paying fees to Approve and Revoke there.   OR is there a better / cheaper way? Thanx again!
Yes I would make sure the approvals are removed completely. Etherscan is showing more than 4 sites when I look at your address. Make sure you are toggling “Show All Approvals”
Thank you again.   I did not Toggle “all approvals”  - now I have.   Thanks again.  Have a blessed day.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
